result.content:
• Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .ScenarioLibrary (edit)

These scenarios will be accessible to all test cases in the the FitNesseRoot folder. If you are using a different FitNesseRoot Folder, make sure to copy these files if using any setup scenarios.


Update these variables for your specific test environment


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Variables for Scenarios

Default browser can be FIREFOX or CHROME
variable defined: defaultBrowser=FIREFOX

Default Version can be any supported Appian Version in xx.x format from (21.2 - 23.1)
variable defined: defaultVersion=23.1

Default Locale can be en_US or en_GB
variable defined: defaultLocale=en_US

Default URL should include http or https and /suite (e.g. https://forum.appian.com/suite )
variable defined: defaultUrl=REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

To use out of the box functionality, do not update the scenarios below


  • Expand
  • Collapse

Setup customizable for browser, locale, version, and URL

scenario setup for test script for browser browserType locale location version versionNum url appianUrl
setup with browser @browserType
set appian locale to @location
set appian version to @versionNum
set appian url to @appianUrl
set timeout seconds to 20
set start datetime

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Scenario - Setup using default values

scenario setup for test script
setup for test script for browser FIREFOX locale en_US version 23.1 url REPLACE_APPIAN_URL

  • Expand
  • Collapse

FitNesse Configurations


variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim
variable defined: COMMAND_PATTERN=java -Dlog4j.configuration=file:///${automated.testing.home}/log4j.properties -cp %p %m
classpath: C:\FitNesseForAppian/**.jar

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Initialization and Login to Tempo


script com.appiancorp.ps.automatedtest.fixture.TempoFixture
setup with CHROME browser
set appian url to https://appiancoe.vuram.com/suite/sites/d2207kuso-supplier-onboarding
set appian version to 23.1
set appian locale to en_US
login with username AshwiniR

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Field Validation


Script
Click on menu HOME
verify link ADD NEW SUPPLIER is not present
click on menu SUPPLIERS
click on grid [1] column Task row [1]
click on record related action Related Actions
verify link ACCREDIT SUPPLIER is not present
logout
tear down

instructionResult.instruction: {id='scriptTable_3_1', instruction='call', instanceName='scriptTableActor', methodName='verifyLinkIsNotPresent', args=[ADD NEW SUPPLIER]}
